== North Thrikkaripur (CT) (627173) ==

North Thrikkaripur (CT) is a town in the [[Hosdurg]] taluka of [[Kasaragod]] district with an area of 9.02 sq. km. and harbouring 3771 households with total population of 18210 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kasaragod]] is at a distance of 57 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 574 km. Male population is 8409 and female population is 9801. Scheduled Caste population is 990 and Scheduled Tribes population is 17. Census Location Code of the town is 627173<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 17 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 135 km. Railway station is at North thrikkaripur at a distance of 0 km.
